abstract: Shares of Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway fell below $100,000 on Thursday for the first time since October 2006, less than a week after the company revealed large unrealized losses on derivative contracts tied to the stock market’s performance.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway fell below $100,000 on Thursday for the first time since October 2006, less than a week after the company revealed large unrealized losses on derivative contracts tied to the stock market’s performance.

headline.main: Berkshire a Bargain at Less Than $100,000 per Share
